item.title: Shinkansen controller
item.description: Overview Name Shinkansen controller (Nintendo Wii) Release date March 1, 2007 Serial code TCPP-20017 Notes Supported software (WIP) Software Support Notes Densha de GO! Shinkansen EX San'y≈ç Shinkansen-hen (Nintendo Wii) Native Technical details This controller is similar externally to the PlayStation 2 version of the Shinkansen controller. However, the screen has been replaced by a sticker and there is no pedal, so the only functioning parts are the handles, the buttons and the door lamp.
